page.title: 13LARKHALL SECONDARY EDUCATION
page.content: IN THE 1984/85 SESSION A NEW DAY WAS INTRODUCED.INSTEAD OF THE DAY BEING SPLIT UP INTO 8,40 MINUTE PERIODS IT IS NOW SPLIT UP INTO 5,HOUR PERIODS.IN A SURVEY TAKEN AT THE END OF THE SCHOOL SESSION IT WAS FOUND THAT MOST OF THE PUPILS LIKED THE 5 PERIOD DAY. THE MAIN REASON BEING THAT IT MAKES THE DAY SEEM SHORTER EVEN THOUGH IT STILL RUNS FROM 9AM TO 3.55PM. VANDALISM IS BECOMING AN INCREASINGLY LARGE PROBLEM IN LARKHALL ACADEMY WITH GLASS WINDOWS AND EXTERIOR PANELS BEING BROKEN.
